values: When we twist something we turn it around and around.
She twisted the spaghetti around her fork.

vt.，&，vi.拧，捻，搓，扭曲，弯曲，n.扭曲，弯曲，盘旋，捻，拧
转折， 突然变化； 卷曲物
To twist is to bend or turn something out of its natural shape or to distort or change the meaning of something.
Twist means to turn or rotate something, often in a way that causes it to become distorted or spiral-shaped.
n. 扭曲；拧；扭伤,vt. 捻；拧；扭伤；编织；使苦恼,vi. 扭动；弯曲
